fixedata.title: Income Proof
fixedata.message:
For salaried individuals: Salary slips of the last 3 months, Form 16, and/or Income Tax Returns (ITR)
For self-employed individuals: ITR, Profit & Loss account, Balance Sheet, and/or Business Proof

firstCircle.title: Photographs
firstCircle.message: Passport size photographs of the applicant and co-applicant (if any).

firstCircle.title: Property Documents
firstCircle.message: If applicable as collateral, documents related to the property being pledged.

firstCircle.title: Bank Statements
firstCircle.message: For the last 6 months (both applicant and co-applicant).

firstCircle.title: Academic Records
firstCircle.message:
Mark sheets and certificates of qualifying exams.
Admission letter.

secondCircle.title: Identity Proof
secondCircle.message:
Any one of the following:
Passport
Aadhaar
Voter ID
Driving license

secondCircle.title: Residence Proof
secondCircle.message:
Any one of the following:
Passport
Aadhaar
Voter ID
Driving license

thirdCircle.title: Guarantor Form
thirdCircle.message: If required, duly filled and signed.
